summary: Completed comprehensive frontend and backend testing for Snag-App PMC system. All core functionality working correctly including authentication, navigation, CRUD operations, and UI interactions.

minor_bugs.endpoint: All protected endpoints with invalid JWT token
minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 Internal Server Error instead of 401 Unauthorized for invalid JWT tokens
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality but could improve error handling

passed_tests: Login page loads correctly with dark theme and pre-filled credentials
Dashboard page loads with correct stats cards (Total: 3, Open: 0, In Progress: 3, Resolved: 0, High Priority: 3)
Recent snags table displays correctly with 3 existing snags
Navigation sidebar works correctly - all tabs (Dashboard, Snags, Users, Notifications) clickable
Snags page loads with proper table, filters, and action buttons
Filter functionality works (status, priority, project filters)
Export buttons (Excel & PDF) are present and accessible
Create Snag modal opens and form submission works correctly
New snag creation successful - created 'Test Building B' snag via automation
Snag detail modal opens and displays complete snag information
Users page loads showing 4 user cards with role badges
Create User button accessible for manager role
Notifications page loads correctly (showing 0 unread notifications)
Logout functionality works - returns to login page
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Dark theme UI design consistent across all pages
Form validation and modal interactions working properly
